column4: So, how to install a later version of SDL.  How to update from 1.2.11.  Please help, I'm dying over here!
Stuck in a bug.  Can't play starcon 2!  Terrible!
oh...  Well, thanks for actually responding.  You're the first!
Noob question: How would I go about upgrading SDL to a later version (than 1.2.11)?
If you're referring to upgrading SDL beyond the version supplied in the repositories, then unfortunately, it isn't really within realistic reach of a "noob".
Well, thanks for responding.  I suppose there will be a new version in the repos with the release of 8.04?

That's probable.  The unfortunate thing about Ubuntu's package-based distribution system is that it's hard for inexperienced users (and a hassle for experienced users) to go past the versions in the repositories.
And the maintainers can't upgrade versions frivolously at the risk of breaking other stuff.
starcon 2 is released under the GPL, and has been ported to linux.
Oh.  I hadn't heard of it.
You must be new at everything to not have heard of starcon 2
I haven't had the time to play a lot of games lately.
It's not a 'lately' kind of game
It's the kind of classic that should be mandatory to have a vote in any democratic system.  Kind of like the age of majority.
Then you've played Master of Orion, as well.  :-)
I wouldn't call myself a human being if I hadn't.  I played it so much it developed a crack and exploded in my computer
Sadly I haven't played it since.
Brilliant.  I'll see if I can fit in Star Control 2 sometime.
It's an epic(ish) interstellar adventure game of massively epic proportions.  By the way, it is not affiliated with Starcon 3 in any way.  Ever.
